title: Environment
description:
The environment block lets you refine the Couper configuration based on the set
environment.

children.value: block lets you refine the Couper configuration based on the set
block works like a preprocessor. If the label of an
block does not match the set

value, the preprocessor
removes this block and its content. Otherwise, the content of the block is added
to the configuration.
